Reviews.Title: Nice for the price.
Reviews.Author: knicksfan
Reviews.Content: This item shipped quickly and arrived completely undamaged from shipping. It works great. It won't completely blow anyone away with its specs but it is very functional for around $310.  If you only need something for web browsing, word processing, music and movies, then this computer will do the job well.

Reviews.Title: Good choice for the price
Reviews.Author: Troy
Reviews.Content: This model is a great buy. You get more than other brands offer at same price range. Can't go wrong with this product.

Reviews.Title: Not Worth It
Reviews.Author: Kelsey Webb
Reviews.Content: Stay away!! If you want to pay a decent chunk of change for a big "laptop" with nothing more than netbook capabilities, this is the computer for you.I previously owned a Gateway laptop, purchased about a year before this one. I loved it and it worked great. When I needed to replace it, I opted to buy this newer model, seemingly exactly the same, and the same price I had paid for the previous one. While relatively lightweight, it is a disappointment. I did not read the specs closely enough when purchasing and am dissatisfied with this product as a result. It is slow, (not internet-wise - if you have a good wifi connection, internet works decently well - processing is awful) the battery dies very quickly even on the lowest brightness and with no other programs running, and it lacks even a basic CD drive. It runs when you need it to, but not well. There are much better laptops for less money - trust me.

Reviews.Title: Great laptop for the $$$
Reviews.Author: Coolbreeze
Reviews.Content: Needed a laptop for internet browsing,email,and work related online education.This laptop has been perfect and the price was right.Received it in two days(regular shipping).

Reviews.Title: computer times
Reviews.Author: stever220
Reviews.Content: I bought this Gateway because I had one in the past and was happy with it. This one is very nice, durable, lightweight and the graphics are nice. The windows 8 sorta sucks , but as I get used to it will be fine.

Reviews.Title: Gateway Laptop
Reviews.Author: Rolandon S.
Reviews.Content: This is a very new nice laptop for the money. I'm getting used to using the windows 8.1 because it makes it easier to used with the apps.  I would tell anyone to buy this laptop.

Reviews.Title: to slow processor for the os
Reviews.Author: chris sanders
Reviews.Content: it is so slow it is no where a i3 intl duel core, and im not sure what gateway was thinking so not a good buy and the windows just stops working  all the time u will not like this processor on this operating system(i beta tested windows 8 so i know how it works)

Reviews.Title: DO NOT DEAL WITH THIS COMPANY NOT ABOVE BOARD.
Reviews.Author: Thomas Pinder
Reviews.Content: could not open to put the cd in to the laptop. Did not come with a manual and I could not get one off the internet from the company. Everything was wrong with this purchase. Warning do not deal this this company.

Reviews.Title: laptop rating
Reviews.Author: Bernie Seibert
Reviews.Content: For the price it's ok. I had a problem with the touch pad not responding properly but after downloading a new driver it worked good for a while and then it stopped working for a while but it's ok now

Reviews.Title: Disappointed with this laptop.
Reviews.Author: Leya Cotten
Reviews.Content: When my Sony VAIO died I decided to replace it with the cheapest laptop I could find.  I was able to get this Gateway laptop for $225.  I should have done more research.  This laptop is so slow that I can't play the games I used to play and I can't stream videos.  I hate that it didn't have a manual because I'm not good at figuring out how to use it and it is hard finding info online.I have a big problem using the mouse.  On the second day I had the laptop the mouse froze and I couldn't figure out how to make it work.  This happens a lot and all I can do is restart the computer to make it work.  I checked to make sure the correct driver is installed and it us.  I've searched online for solutions and nothing works.  I didn't have this problem with the VAIO.Now I know the saying "You get what you pay for" can be true.  When this laptop dies I will do more research before buying another.
